summary: In 1793, as the Terror begins in France, Georges Danton, a champion-of-the-people, returns to clash against Maximilien Robespierre and his extremist party.
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Wojciech Pszoniak|Anne Alvaro|Roland Blanche|Patrice Chéreau|Emmanuelle Debever|Krzysztof Globisz|Ronald Guttman|Gérard Hardy|Tadeusz Huk|Stéphane Jobert|Marian Kociniak|Marek Kondrat|Boguslaw Linda|Alain Macé|Bernard Maître|Lucien Melki|Serge Merlin|Erwin Nowiaszek|Leonard Pietraszak|Roger Planchon|Angel Sedgwick|Andrzej Seweryn|Franciszek Starowieyski|Jerzy Trela|Jacques Villeret|Angela Winkler|Jean-Loup Wolff|Czeslaw Wollejko|Wladimir Yordanoff|Malgorzata Zajaczkowska|Szymon Zaleski|Artus de Penguern|Eugeniusz Priwieziencew
title: Danton
